description: Apple has refused to put macOS on their iPads, but Apple users want to know, why not? Video director, Owen Grove, dives into answering this question by speaking to experts and trying to use the iPad Pro as his work device while mirroring macOS.  00:00 Intro 01:12 Using iPads for "Pro" work. 01:58 Powerful hardware, sleeping software 02:34 UTM and virtualization limitation 03:04 How to try macOS on iPad 03:53 How it feels to use macOS on iPad for drawing and in general. 05:09 Editing video in macOS on iPad 06:52 Developer interview: Is running macOS on iPad a software or hardware challenge? 09:51 Is macOS on iPad bad for business? Apple's choice. 10:40 Is Apple afraid the iPad would cannibalize the Mac? 11:07 Interview with Nilay: Apple's business decisions 12:31 What's the real money reason? 14:11 Conclusion: Apple. Why not?
